mods.name: EridiumLib
description:
Holds utility functions for some mods.

Everything related to versions and their release notes can be found in the [changelog](https://github.com/RLNT/bl2_eridium/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md).
If you found a bug or you have a feature request, please use our issue tracker linked below.
In case you need support, please join our [Discord](https://discordapp.com/invite/Q3qxws6).
mods.tagline: Holds utility functions for some mods.
